pkgName.description: The name of the package such as `gcompris` or `ultracopier`.

localizations.description: This is an array of translations for the package identified by the `name`. Each item indicates a single translation of a specific item such as the `title` for a specific language.

createTimestamp.description: This optional field indicates when the translation was created; millis since the epoch.

modifyTimestamp.description: This optional field indicates when the translation was last modified; millis since the epoch.

naturalLanguageCode.description: This is a two-character (Set 1) ISO-639 natural language code to identify the language of the translation.

content.pattern: This is the localization for the package and the content type identified by the `code` field. If this is `null` or empty then it indicates there is no translation or the translation should be deleted.

userDescription.description: This is a description of the actor who edited the localization. This may not be able to be provided on read and so may be absent.
